## How to assign admin roles with different permissions?

Curricula leverages the following admin roles to assign different permissions
to administrators:

• Application admin – An application admin can configure all settings and view
all resources in Curricula.

• Course admin – A course admin can view and configure all courses.

• Programme admin – A programme admin can view and configure the courses of a
specific programme.

Alex has been assigned as the application admin of Curricula and he would like
to assign different admin roles to the users in their organisation.

#### Assign the application admin or course admin role to users

Let’s see how Alex assigns the application admin or course admin role to
users.

1\. In Curricula, Alex clicks **Admin** on the left navigation pane, and then
clicks **Role management**.

2\. In the **Global** tab, he hovers his mouse over the row of a role and
clicks the Edit button.

3\. In the **Users** section, Alex enters the names of specific users or
Microsoft Entra groups. He can also select users or groups from the address
book.

4\. When Alex finishes the assignment, he clicks **Save**.

#### Assign the programme admin role to users

The programme admin role can be assigned to users when Alex creates
programmes.
